text: قَالَ سَوْفَ أَسْتَغْفِرُ لَكُمْ رَبِّىٓ ۖ إِنَّهُۥ هُوَ ٱلْغَفُورُ ٱلرَّحِيمُ

translation.en.sahih: He said, "I will ask forgiveness for you from my Lord. Indeed, it is He who is the Forgiving, the Merciful."
translation.id.indonesian: Ya'qub berkata: "Aku akan memohonkan ampun bagimu kepada Tuhanku. Sesungguhnya Dialah Yang Maha Pengampun lagi Maha Penyayang".
